availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Enrolled Militia Records 1864 - 1865 ; Adair, Allen, Boyle, Daviess, Garrard, Owen, Pendleton, and Shelby counties
msIdentifier.idno: Flat Box 7, Folder 860-64 DAVIESS COUNTY Commissiond Officers and Oath of Office 2nd Rgt, Ky Militia

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Frankfort, July 7" 1864.
SPECIAL ORDERS,
NO. 46.
The resignation of the following named Officer is accepted to take effect from this date.

By command of the Governor:
John Boyle
Adjutant General of Kentucky.

Genl D W. Lindsey
Inspr Genl

Adjt Genls Office (Report)
July 7th 1864
Resignation of the following named officer accepted to take effect from date, McHenry Jno H. Jr Col Comdg 2nd regt. Ky. E. M.
Recorded
Recd I. G. O. July 8th 1864
